donate:

If you'd like to donate, [click here](https://donate.dgongut.com).

error_cannot_analyze_url:

â€¢ The site requires login (Instagram, Facebook, etc.)
â€¢ The content is private or has been deleted
â€¢ The site is not supported by yt-dlp

Try with public content from YouTube, TikTok, Twitter, Vimeo, etc.

Check out [DockerHub](https://hub.docker.com/r/dgongut/dropbot) where you will find a docker-compose.

Are you curious? The code is published on [GitHub](https://github.com/dgongut/dropbot).
